data.title: Stormglass API key acquisition and quota setup

data.body: Create Stormglass account, generate API key, and store as STORMGLASS_API_KEY. Record plan for 10 req/day quota.

Action needed (human): create a Stormglass account and generate an API key for Harbor Watch server use. What we request from the API: , , and  for NY Harbor point coordinates, source , polled by . Why we need the key: this provider is key-gated and free tier is limited (10 req/day). Required output: provide key value for  in local/prod secrets. Links: https://stormglass.io/ and https://stormglass.io/our-api

Action needed (human): create a Stormglass account and generate an API key for Harbor Watch server use. API request scope in our code: waveHeight, swellHeight, and waterTemperature for NY Harbor coordinates, using source=noaa, polled by the /api/data-sources integration endpoint. Why this key is needed: Stormglass is key-gated and free tier is limited to 10 requests/day. Required deliverable: provide key for env var STORMGLASS_API_KEY in local and production secrets. Links: https://stormglass.io/ and https://stormglass.io/our-api
